name: Crocolike
description:
Special thanks to Krystman (Tutorials)

How to play: 
Climb the floors and survive as more as you can.
Every 9th floor - some reward.
The higher floor is - The better items you can get.
The better items you can get - the worse monsters will appear.
Bump in everything to interact with it

Keys:

arrows - move / interact
x - inventory / accept
z - close / refuse
